00094         protected function save(&$queryFields) {
00095                 
00096                 //if adodb is installed
00097                 if(t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('adodb')) {
00098                         require_once(t3lib_extMgm::extPath('adodb').'adodb/adodb.inc.php');
00099                         
00100                         //build sql
00101                         
00102                         //insert query
00103                         if(!$this->doUpdate) {
00104                                 foreach($queryFields as $dbfield=>$value) {
00105                                         $fields[$dbfield] = $value;
00106                                         if(!is_numeric($value)) {
00107                                                 $fields[$dbfield] = "'".$value."'";
00108                                         }
00109                                 }
00110                                 $sql = "INSERT INTO ".$this->table." (".(implode(',',array_keys($fields))).") VALUES (".(implode(',',$fields)).")";
00111                                 
00112                         //update query
00113                         } else {
00114                                 
00115                                 //check if uid of record to update is in GP
00116                                 $uid = $this->gp['uid'];
00117                                 if(!$uid) {
00118                                         $uid = $this->gp[$this->key];
00119                                 }
00120                                 if($uid) {
00121                                         $fields = array();
00122                                         foreach($queryFields as $dbfield=>$value) {
00123                                                 if(is_numeric($value)) {
00124                                                         $fields[] = $dbfield."=".$value;
00125                                                 } else {
00126                                                         $fields[] = $dbfield."='".$value."'";
00127                                                 }
00128                                         }
00129                                         $fields = implode(",",$fields);
00130                                         $sql = "UPDATE ".$this->table." SET (".$fields.") WHERE ".$this->key."=".$uid;
00131                                 } else {
00132                                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("UID parameter not found in GP. Cannot make update!");
00133                                 }
00134                         }
00135                         
00136                         //open connection
00137                         $conn = &NewADOConnection($this->driver);
00138                         $host = $this->host;
00139                         if($this->port) {
00140                                 $host .= ":".$this->port;
00141                         }
00142                         if($this->db) {
00143                                 $conn->Connect($host, $this->user, $this->password, $this->db);
00144                         } else {
00145                                 $conn->Connect($host, $this->user, $this->password);
00146                         }
00147                         
00148                         //insert data
00149                         $conn->Execute($sql);
00150                         
00151                         //close connection
00152                         $conn->Close();
00153                 } else {
00154                         throw new Exception("The Extension 'adodb' is required for this task!");
00155                 }
00156         }
00157         
00164         protected function init() {
00165                 parent::init();
00166                 $this->driver = $this->settings['driver'];
00167                 $this->db = $this->settings['db'];
00168                 $this->host = $this->settings['host'];
00169                 $this->port = $this->settings['port'];
00170                 $this->user = $this->settings['username'];
00171                 $this->password = $this->settings['password'];
00172                 if(!$this->driver) {
00173                         throw new Exception("No driver given!");
00174                 }
00175         }
00176         
00177 }
